alert.note: Alert for Clay (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 3:48AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Clay and Nuckolls Counties through 415 AM CDT... At 347 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lawrence, or 18 miles southeast of Hastings, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Edgar and Deweese around 400 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Nora, Davenport, Ruskin and Oak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
